label: Book of hours (Dutch), LTK 286

metadata.label: Content
metadata.value: Contains parts of a book of hours in the Dutch translation/adaptation by Geert Grote: (ff. 1r-24r) Hours of the Virgin. Incomplete. - (ff. 24v-46v) Penitential Psalms and Litany of the Saints. Incomplete.

metadata.label: Note
value: Leaf missing between ff. 37 and 38, with consequent loss of text.
Textual: Dutch adaptation/translation by Geert Grote.
